Title: Emerald Green
Writer: Katharina Schöde (screenplay), Felix Fuchssteiner (screenplay), Barry Thomson, Kerstin Gier (novel)
Actors: Kostja Ullmann, Josefine Preuß, Maria Ehrich, Jannis Niewöhner
Plot: Adaptation of the final part of famous time-travel trilogy. Gwendolyn's heart is broken, will she trust Gideon again? There's no time to wallow in tears. Something unbelievable happens, and Gwendolyn finds herself in the race against time.
